room_title: Escape room "Bermuda Triangle" by Escape This Norman in Oklahoma City
room_address: 550 24th Ave NW Suite C Norman, OK 73069
room_description: During your ship’s discovery expedition off the North American coast, a sudden, severe storm forces your crew into the Bermuda Triangle.  Your ship goes into distress and begins to take on water.  Can you find the correct coordinates to escape or will your crew become a part of the dreaded Triangle’s haunted history??
